Meanings: Beginnings, freedom, innocence, originality, adventure, idealism, spontaneity|Joyful, exuberant first steps|Small bag - cares nothing for possible dangers/obstacles|Close to the edge, but unaware/naive|Dog at heels barking in warning - if he does not become aware of his surroundings soon, he may never see all the adventures he dreams of encountering|0 - number of infinite potential|Blank slate, no clear personality|Anything can happen|Every day is a new adventure|Call to take a risk/leap of faith|Awe and curiosity

Willpower, desire, creation, manifestation, resourcefulness, skill, ability, concentration|One hand to the sky, one to the ground - "as above, so below"|Wields all four suits, connects all elements|Pure willpower|With power of elements he takes the potential of the fool and molds it into being|You are powerful, create your inner world and the outer world will follow|Need to tap into full potential|Don't hold back|Create your own world or someone else will do it for you

Unconscious, intuition, mystery, spirituality, higher power, inner voice|Guardian of the unconscious and beckons the traveller to the world within|Complete grasp on emotions, ambitious|Inner knowledge, listen to your intuition rather than prioritising your intellect and conscious mind|Divine feminine - understands and holds answers to the deep unknowns; religion, self and nature.|Beginning to open her spirituality|Need for meditation, prayer and new spiritual work|Search for answers within yourself

Motherhood, fertility, nature, divine feminine, sensuality, nurturing, creativity, beauty, abundance|Represents the Earth Mother|Complete love, harmony, fertility and luxury|Brings abundance and blessings|Shows deep connection to femininity (fertility, expression, creativity, nurturing)|Connect with beauty and bring happiness to your life|Be kind to yourself, take care of yourself|Birth of new idea, business or project|Good fortune|Bring forth your ideas and devote yourself to accomplishing them|Your ideas will be successful and well taken care of

Stability, structure, protection, authority, control, practicality, focus, discipline, fatherliness|Stoic ruler figure|Rams heads - Aries|Sceptre - reign/right to rule, orb - symbol of kingdom he watches over|Long beard - vast experience|Strategic thinker|Paternal - gives structure, creates rules and systems, imparts knowledge|Honour and discipline|Acts rationally IAW greater good|Represents a chance to grow in terms of your goals|Successful future as long as you pursue your goals methodically and strategically|You may be put in charge of something important, called to act with wisdom, order and a clear decisive mind

Tradition, social groups, conventionality, conformity, education, knowledge, beliefs|Religious figure in a formal environment|Right hand raised in blessing, triple cross - pope (the Father, the Son, the Holy Spirit)|Two acolytes - transfer of sacred knowledge|Masculine counterpart of the High Priestess - rather than following inner self, follow outer world (already established)|Embrace the conventional, follow well established processes, orthodox approach|Adapt to certain beliefs and systems, follow social structures

Love, unions, partnerships, relationships, choices, romance, balance, unity|Harmony, attractiveness, perfection in a relationship|Trust and unity gives confidence and strength, empowering each party|Choose what is important in your life and what is not - follows on from Hierophant (develop your own beliefs/values)|Be true to yourself to be true and authentic to others

Success, ambition, determination, willpower, control, self-discipline, focus|Black and white sphinxes - opposing forces that need to be controlled|Guide sphinxes to work together to reach a destination|Overcoming challenges, gaining victory through control of your surroundings|Maintain focus, confidence and determination|Pursue plans with a structured and ordered approach|Aggression may be used to help you take charge, but it may need to be reined in.

Courage, bravery, confidence, compassion, self-confidence, inner power|Woman gracefully controlling lion, calm and collected|Maintain control and discipline in times of great adversity|Gentle control - love and compassion|Inner strength and fortitude during times of danger and distress|You are compassionate and always have time for others, even at your own expense|You are patient and likely to accomplish what you put your mind to|You are resilient and fearless|Your compassion will be rewarded with stability in your life

Self-reflection, introspection, contemplation, withdrawal, solitude, search for self, search for truth|Six pointed star - wisdom, staff - authority and power|Seeker of knowledge that comes from within|Inner voice - to hear it one must disconnect from the crowds |Walks through dark night of unconscious, with destination being his home, his self|You are currently contemplating that you need to be alone|Take a chance to reflect, clear your mind|Take action that is authentic and aligned with your self|Appearance of someone who will be your mentor.

Change, cycles, fate, decisive moments, luck, fortune, unexpected events|The Wheel of Fortune turns evermore, to communicate that life is made of both good and bad, and we cannot control it|What goes up must come down, and bad things will eventually turn to good|Greater forces outside of human control are at work

Justice, karma, consequence, accountability, law, truth, honesty, integrity, cause and effect|Judgement will be made fairly and accordingly|If you have been wronged, this card's appearance may bring you relief|If you have caused harm, this card serves as a warning|This is a chance to change your actions, it is time to account for your actions|Truth - learn the facts before passing judgement|Be fair in all your deeds|Attention is needed, it is time to get a solution once and for all

Sacrifice, waiting, uncertainty, lack of direction, perspective, contemplation|Hanging man is positioned there by his own free will (serene expression)|His position is a sacrifice that needs to be made in order to progress forward, the time spent here will not be wasted|See the world differently|Suspend certain action, may be a period of indecision|Stall certain actions to ensure you have more time to reflect on making critical decisions|Wait for the right opportunity

Transformation, endings, change, transition, letting go, release|A major phase in your life is ending, and a new one is going to start|Place the past behind you to focus your energy on what is ahead|The old version of you needs to 'die' to allow the new you to be created|Let go of any unhealthy attachments

Balance, peace, patience, moderation, calm, tranquility, harmony, serenity|Two cups mixing - flow between super and subconscious minds, unity and infinity|Not letting things get to you|Moderation and balance, with patience|Extremity in any situation is to be avoided|Clear vision, knowing what you want to achieve - you have found peace|You are able to adapt and work in harmony with others|Evaluate your priorities|Balance outer and inner self

Oppression, addiction, obsession, dependency, excess, powerlessness, limitations|You have feelings of entrapment, emptiness and lack of fulfillment in your life|You are a slave to materialism and opulence, you want to indulge in luxurious living|You feel out of control of your urges
Disaster, destruction, upheaval, trauma, sudden change, chaos|Radical and momentous change|Our old truths/beliefs are no longer useful|Replace old foundations of the past|Take damage control actions

Hope, inspiration, positivity, faith, renewal, healing, rejuvenation|Hope, renewed power, and strength to carry on with life|Shows abundant blessings from the universe|You have gone and passed through a terrible life challenge without losing hope (The Tower)|You are now aware of your own strength and resilience. It is only now that you can really appreciate all you have

Illusion, intuition, uncertainty, confusion, complexity, secrets, unconscious|Wolf and dog - wild, feral nature and civilised nature|Dual possibilities|Towers on opposing ends represent good forces and evil, similarities in appearance allude to the difficulties we face in distinguishing them|Your imagination is taking the best of you|The moon, your intuition, can bring you clarity and understanding in the darkness|Some hidden truth must be discovered, for what you are seeing now may be a trick of the light|Search for hidden forces that must be unraveled

Happiness, success, optimism, vitality, joy, confidence, happiness, truth|Represents the dawn following the darkest nights|Represents life energy itself|Child - happiness that occurs when you are in alignment with your true self|Nakedness - nothing to hide|Innocence and absolute purity (white horse)|Success, abundance, radiance|Much joy and happiness coming to you|Because of your own personal fulfillment, you provide others with inspiration and joy|People are drawn to your warmth and energy|Radiate love and affection towards those you care most about.|Significant sense of deserved confidence|Nothing but good feelings and fulfillment

Self-evaluation, awakening, renewal, purpose, reflection, reckoning|Reflection and evaluation of ourselves and our actions|You are coming close to a significant point in your life where you must start to evaluate yourself|You are in a period of awakening, brought on by self-reflection|You have a clearer idea of what you need to change and how you need to be true to yourself and your needs|Reminds us that we all will be faced with choices that can have astounding effects on our lives|This is the time when the consequences of your actions will catch up to you|Let go of your past to move forward and have a new life

Completion, achievement, fulfilment, sense of belonging, wholeness, harmony|Ever-changing, dynamic, and eternal fulfilment and unity|Encountering a great unity and wholeness|The inner and outer worlds become a single entity|All your efforts are starting to pay off|You have completed a major milestone and you have built the resilience to withstand challenges

Inspiration, creative spark, new initiative, new passion, enthusiasm, energy|Bravely finding your own voice, develop your own vision|Just go for it, take the chance|Follow your instincts|Act now|Breakthrough - you are motivated and inspired about a passion, project or idea|Excitement about new opportunities

Planning, first steps, making decisions, leaving comfort zone, taking risks|You have turned an idea into a plan, now you have to progress|Yearning for something else|Courage to leave comfort zone and follow heart|Choice between feeling disappointed or feeling stuck

Momentum, confidence, expansion, growth, foresight, looking ahead|The progression from 2W|The decision to head out on your own|Travel to search for what you are seeing - leaving home, voyage needed|You are in control and have a strong position

Community, home, celebrations, reunions, parties, gatherings, stability, belonging|Evaluate your definition of home|A position of stability and grounding|Surround yourself with people who celebrate your offerings and vulnerabilities

Conflict, competition, arguments, aggression, tension, rivals, clashes of ego|Some kind of disagreement, conflict or good-natured rivalry|Only want to be heard, not listen|Facing competition|Struggle between different aspects of ourselves

Success, victory, triumph, rewards, recognition, praise, acclaim, pride|Evaluate how you define success|You have gotten through the confusion of 5W, but remember that your struggles are not over (7W)|Can bring self-importance and egotistical behaviour, arrogance

Protectiveness, standing up for yourself, defending yourself, protecting territory|Struggle to maintain position that you have already attained|Difficulties we face to continue to have success|Challenges from an outside source|Hold your ground, take a stand|Consider how you react when you feel threatened

Movement, speed, progress, quick decisions, sudden changes, excitement|Strong level of energy|Allow events to take their course|Balance willpower and allowing|What things are within your control, and what things are outside your control?

Last stand, persistence, grit, resilience, perseverance, close to success, fatigue|Won many battles (upright wands), but there are still more trials|Hope and encouragement that you should face your trials with courage to attain success|Evaluate your boundaries, are they really protecting you?

Burden, responsibility, duty, stress, obligation, burning out, struggles|Need to prioritise to ensure you remain in control|Understand you cannot solve everything, and share the burden|Are your needs and wants enmeshed with those of others?|Evaluate your personal limits
Exploration, excitement, freedom|On the brink of a new creative project and vision|Spirit of discovery and childlike enthusiasm|In touch with true desires

Action, adventure, fearlessness|Manifestation of an idea and passionate pursuit of a vision|Action-oriented|Brash, impulsive, unrealistic, missing stable foundation (rearing horse)|Collecting resources and taking action|Upsetting the status quo
Confident, courageous, determined|Building and maintaining a steady burn|How do we nourish ourselves and others? How do we generate warmth and light?|Be in touch with your creative spirit
Big picture, leader, overcoming challenges|Remain civilised in times of anger, passion, despair, and conflict|Great vision and leadership|Leads and inspires others with his passion

Love, new feelings, emotional awakening, creativity, spirituality, intuition|Open yourself to possibilities that will make you emotionally fulfilled|Spiritual or emotional receptivity|Make space for emotions

Unity, partnership, attraction, connection, close bonds, joining forces, mutual respect|Relinquish the projections and distortions about others |Partnership, balanced with a strong connection|Mutual respect, people appreciating you|Share the positive energy you are receiving from the universe

Friendship, community, gatherings, celebrations, group events, social events|A period of happiness, forget your worries and spend quality time with family and friends|Contribute to and reinforce the well-being of others|How can you bring joy to those around you?

Apathy, contemplation, feeling disconnected, melancholy, boredom, indifference, discontent|Failure to listen and be receptive|Tendency to take things for granted, making it hard to see what treasures the universe presents to us|Feeling discouraged and unmotivated|Listen to the cues from the world around you|

Loss, grief, disappointment, sadness, mourning, discontent, feeling let down|Mourning over lost cups and doesn't notice ones still standing|So caught up in your past that you are incapable of moving on|High chance of missing out on new joys that the future can bring|Change your perspective

Nostalgia, memories, familiarity, healing, comfort, sentimentality, pleasure|Generosity, naive happiness and childhood|You want to return to a happier time|Whilst we may look upon the past with a happy eye, we must avoid living in it|Returning to a familiar place|You have suffered a loss (5C) and are journeying home|Seek comfort and warmth of those who love you to gather strength for upcoming challenges

Choices, searching for purpose, illusion, fantasy, daydreaming, wishful thinking, indecision|Consider the many alternative endings, positive or negative|Be careful of wishful thinking and be alert of the choices you must make|The power of the imagination for good and bad

Abandonment, walking away, letting go, searching for truth, leaving behind|Time for change or transition by walking away from something|You have all the resources you need to embark on your journey; you don't need the 8 cups|You are dissatisfied with life and need to leave it behind and seek a higher purpose|True happiness cannot be found in what you have already created|You are tired of worldly things and about to embark on a much more spiritual journey

Wishes coming true, contentment, satisfaction, success, achievement, recognition, pleasure|Self-satisfaction after a long journey|Consider what you truly desire|The things you wish for are about to come true|Your desired state is soon to be reached

Happiness, homecomings, fulfillment, emotional stability, security, domestic harmony|Emotional fulfillment: being able to experience the full spectrum of emotions|Be thankful for your blessings|No change is needed, enjoy the fact that you are in the right spot
Explore your emotions with curiosity|Innoncence and sensitivity|Fish - unconscious trying to make contact
Do not allow emotions to dominate behaviour|Relate feelings to sets of actions e.g. Love is a by-product of loving action, not a pre-requisite
Separates her emotions from others'|Highly present|Sensitively attuned|Good boundaries|Genuine engagement with others

Compassion, control, balance|Full of emotions but understands how and when to apply them|Able to resolve emotions|Doesn't avoid emotions, receives and resolves them|Understanding the transient nature of emotions

Clarity, breakthrough, new idea, concentration, vision, force, focus, truth|Moment in which one sees the world from a different point of view|Step back and take time to observe|Recognising that the sword isn't the right tool for every challenge, but it is for some

Stalemate, difficult choices, stuck in the middle, denial, hidden information|Avoid indecision|Determine which thoughts you will give weight to|Confusion when we have to make difficult choices|Don't evade your problems - face them in order to solve them

Heartbreak, separation, sadness, grief, sorrow, upset, loss, trauma, tears|You can minimise your pain by thinking logically|Choose the head over the heart|You need to allow yourself to experience sadness, anger, guilt/shame so you can heal

Rest, relaxation, peace, sanctuary, recuperation, self-protection, rejuvenation|It is time to retreat and rest|Learn to sit with your emotions|Gain strength and clarity in a quiet environment|Re-evaluate, organise and understand your priorities|Gather new strength and prepare to face a new challenge

Arguments, disputes, aggression, bullying, intimidation, conflict, hostility, stress|View experiences of revocation, dishonour, and loss as opportunities for growth|You believed it was more important to be right|Be considerate of those around you, let go of your ego

Moving on, departure, leaving behind, distance, accepting lessons|Regretful, unhappy transition - most likely resulting from decision you made in the past|You must remember that moving on is the ideal option for your future|Sometimes the only solution is to leave the problem and start again|Plot a new course - think logically about your next moves

Lies, trickery, scheming, strategy, resourcefulness, sneakiness, cunning (the fox card)|Recognise your personal biases and don't allow them to distract you|You or someone in your life is having difficulty getting away with something|Instead of dealing with something you sneak away and try to go unnoticed, but things will come out

Trapped, restricted, victimised, paralysed, helpless, powerless, imprisonment|You feel powerless because, in your mind, you feel that you can't change your situation|Honestly appraise your psychological experiences and how they restrict you|We create these traps ourselves, so we can also find a way out of them|See beyond your limited perspective

Fear, anxiety, negativity, breaking point, despair, nightmares, isolation|Things that worry you and keep you up at night|We escalate into 9S when we are never released from the entrapment of 8S|9S associated with destructive side of the mind which turns on itself|Create space between you and your thoughts to gain clarity, perspective and freedom from their torment

Ruin, failure, bitterness, collapse, exhaustion, dead end, victimisation, betrayal|Do not allow your thoughts to pin you down|Take stock of all resentments, fears, grudges, and weapons formed against you to clear the backlog and release yourself

Recklessness, curiosity, mental energy|Learning to observe the mind|Ready to attack mental activity, but must learn to develop a flexible relationship with it|Embarking on a new idea and mental adventure|Eager to share and discuss thoughts and plans

Complexity, perceptive, clear mindedness, level-headed|Sharp of mind and wit|Knows how to use her sword for the highest good|Great powers of analysis
Intellectual, power, truth|Sharp intellect and clarity of mind|Develop concentration and ability to direct and fix attention at will|Truth and authority|Pillar of strength through presence of mind
New opportunities, resources, abundance, prosperity, security, stability, manifestation|Capacity to behave in a certain way|Understand our sphere of influence|Determine what is precious to you

Balancing resources, adaptation, resourcefulness, flexibility, stretching resources|You are trying to keep aspects of your life in balance|You are able to adapt well to all the changes that you need to continually re-balance|The importance of play and unpredictability in our lives

Teamwork, shared goals, collaboration, apprenticeship, effort, pooling energy|The coming together of different kinds of knowledge to build something common|Do not ignore the talents of those around you|Unite conflicting parts of self|Use your different talents and skills to build a solution

Possessiveness, insecurity, hoarding, stinginess, stability, security, savings, materialism, wealth, frugality, boundaries, guardedness|Can't move while guarding the coins - restrained from action because you are holding onto your possessions too tightly|Money does not always bring freedom|You may start valuing things only for their material worth|You may become overly possessive or greedy|You are currently in a position where you have solid investments and are financially stable, so you are being conservative|There is no reward without risk, don't spend all your time saving

Hardship, loss, isolation, feeling abandoned, adversity, struggle, unemployment, alienation, disgrace|Suggests a time of hardship and insecurity|Being present is a prerequisite to feeling fulfilled|Look to the thing you need the most

Generosity, charity, community, material help, support, sharing, giving and receiving, gratitude|You have a good relationship with your income - balance between income and expenses|You can share your wealth with others, but don't give more than you have|Be aware of your power to give and share|You may be receiving wealth (you are one of the beggars) - do not become desperate or submissive, but focus on self-sufficiency as you get back on your feet

Harvest, rewards, results, growth, progress, perseverance, patience, planning|Investment and effort|Evaluate what you are willing and able to invest in|Your efforts are paying off and will pay off in the future as well|You are not confined to seeing short-term results only|Remain patient and hard-working - you may not see results now but they are on their way

Skill, talent, craftsmanship, quality, high standards, expertise, mastery, commitment, dedication, accomplishment|Town in background - you have isolated yourself from distractions to fully concentrate on the task at hand|You need to work hard and focus hard on your tasks, but maintain a balance

Rewarded efforts, success, achievement, independence, leisure, material security, self-sufficiency|You are confident, independent and self-sufficient|Through hard work you are now ready to enjoy money, leisure and material comfort|You can now celebrate the difficulties, struggles and hard work of earlier|Your previous challenges gave you the wider perspective you need to understand the value of your success and enjoy each day that is given to you|This is a period of restraint and grace

Legacy, roots, family, ancestry, inheritance, windfall, foundations, privilege, affluence, stability, tradition|Diversity, plurality, connection|Understand how your behaviour affects others as we are all interconnected|Your happiness is interwoven with the happiness shared with others|The decisions you make will produce positive results that last well into the future - your legacy
